translation: This space between the earth and the heavens, and all the quarters, is filled by You alone; having seen this, Your wonderful and terrible form, the three worlds are trembling with fear, O great-souled Being.
commentary: 11.20 dyavaprithivyoh of heaven and earth? This is this? Interspace interspace? Hi indeed? Vyaptam is filled? By you by Thee? Alone alone? Directions arters? f and? All of them all? seeing having seen? Wonderful wonderful? form form? Ugram terrible? Your Thy? This is this? Lokatrayam the three worlds? pravyathitam are trembling with fear?
